name: Dice of Vampires
description:
Dice of Vampires is a casual game themed on vampires. You can play as a vampire hunter, or ...?

The combat system is simple: damage is determined by the difference between the dice rolls. The dice can be stopped at any time.

Don't let the vampirism take you over, and vanquish the queens of the night!

If the game does not start, try clicking on the screen.
